resources.string:
Sudoku is a game that contains 81 squares: 
 - 9 rows and 9 columns. 

In traditional Sudoku, each block must contain a digit between 1 and 9, but because this is the programmer's edition, each block must contain a digit between 0 and 8. Each digit can only be repeated once in each row and each column.

The Sudoku puzzle is also composed of 9 square (3x3) blocks that also must contain the digits 0 to 8 and they must appear only once as well.

Keep Trying
When a user presses the Submit Puzzle button, if the puzzle is not correct, the message is displayed to try again.

Solved
The following message is displayed if the puzzle is correct when the user presses the Submit Puzzle button.
